Sentencas: Zirconia stabilised by yttria has a high oxide ion conductivity at high temperature and therefore, is currently used as electrolyte in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells.
Titulo: Structural and electrical characterisation of silica-containing yttria-stabilised zirconia

Sentencas: Silica is normally avoided in this material because formation of amorphous silica phases along the grain boundaries causes an increased grain boundary impedance.
Titulo: Structural and electrical characterisation of silica-containing yttria-stabilised zirconia

Sentencas: The present study examines the effect of SiO2 and SiO2 with Mn-oxide on the structure and resistivity of yttria stabilised zirconia electrolyte materials.
Titulo: Structural and electrical characterisation of silica-containing yttria-stabilised zirconia

Sentencas: During fabrication of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells, Mn readily diffuses from the manganite-based cathode into the electrolyte.
Titulo: Structural and electrical characterisation of silica-containing yttria-stabilised zirconia

Sentencas: It is shown that a grain boundary phase which causes an insulating layer in the grain boundaries is formed when both SiO2 and Mn-oxide coexist in the samples, whereas such effects are much less pronounced when only SiO2 is present.
Titulo: Structural and electrical characterisation of silica-containing yttria-stabilised zirconia
